accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Charles Gossett Collation of Sinclair Oil "Bushbeater" Newsletters #6335m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Bushbeater issues no.1 (1972:Jan. 4) - no.5 (1972:Jan. 8); no.8 (1972:Jan. 12) - no.12 (1972:Jan. 17); no.15 (1972:Jan. 20) - no.17 (1972:Jan. 22). The Bearded Wonder Speaks, volume 9, book 3 (1972:Jan. 17).
